titleStmt.title: A discource of horsmanshippe Wherein the breeding and ryding of horses for seruice, in a breefe manner is more methodically sette downe then hath been heeretofore. With a more easie and direct course for the ignorant, to attaine to the same arte or knowledge. Also the manner to chuse, trayne, ryde and dyet, both hunting-horses, and running-horses: with all the secretes thereto belonging discouered. An arte neuer heeretofore written by any authour.
titleStmt.author: Markham, Gervase, 1568?-1637.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. C[harlewood] for Richard Smith, and are to be sold at his shoppe at the West-doore of Poules,
